amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 70 in the Congressional Record of July 27, 1995, to transfer $155 million in FEMA Disaster Relief funds to the Veteran's Administration for construction of a new medical center in Brevard County, Florida.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Weldon (FL) amendment (A025). Mr. Lewis (CA) stated that the amendment proposed changes to existing law and constituted legislation on an appropriations bill and was, therefore, in violation of clause 2 of rule XXI of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
